responses.body:
[
  {{#repeat 10}}
  {
    "id": {{add @index 1}},
    "name": "{{faker 'lorem.sentence' min=2 max=5}}",
    "status": "pending_approval",
    "priority": "{{int 0 20}}",
    "user_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "file_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "tool_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "material_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "note": "{{faker 'lorem.paragraph' min=1 max=3}}",
    "admin_id": null,
    "cancellation_reason": null,
    "created_at": "{{dateFormat (faker 'date.recent') 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'}}"
  }
  {{/repeat}}
]

[
  {{#repeat 10}}
  {
    "id": {{add @index 1}},
    "name": "{{faker 'lorem.sentence' min=2 max=5}}",
    "status": "pending_approval",
    "priority": "{{int 0 20}}",
    "user_id": "{{jwtPayload (header 'Authorization') 'user_id'}}",
    "file_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "tool_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "material_id": "{{int 1 10}}",
    "note": "{{faker 'lorem.paragraph' min=1 max=3}}",
    "admin_id": null,
    "cancellation_reason": null,
    "created_at": "{{dateFormat (faker 'date.recent') 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'}}"
  }
  {{/repeat}}
]
